articles.title: Bottom Position
articles.description:
This analysis is only for the **main** bottom-lane player in each team, who have appeared in more than 10 matches.

Since every team has players in rotation, the data is not representative for those substitutes with too few appearances.

articles.title: Champion Analysis
articles.description:
This analysis is only for the **main** selected champions in each lane this version, which have appeared in more than 10 matches.

Since some players are good at some non-version mainstream champions, the data is not representative for those substitutes with too few appearances.

            Yiru Huang
          
          
            
              Hi! My name is Yiru Huang(She/Her/Hers), currently a first-year statistics graduate student in University of California, Irvine(UCI). I am interested in data analysis, visualization. This distill website is my final project for course 295.

articles.title: Jungle Position
articles.description:
This analysis is only for the **main** jungle player in each team, who have appeared in more than 10 matches.

Since every team has players in rotation, the data is not representative for those substitutes with too few appearances.

Since every team has players in rotation, the data is not representative for those substitutes with too few appearances.

articles.title: Team Analysis
Top Position
articles.description:
This analysis is only for the **main** top-lane player in each team, who have appeared in more than 10 matches.
